response.original_title: เทยไทบ้านเดอะซีรีส์
response.overview: A heartwarming and hilarious story of a group of close friends, the "Toey Thai Baan Gang," who, despite having different dreams, share the same goal: saving up money to travel to Japan. A dream that seems out of reach when life in the countryside is full of obstacles and uncertainty.
response.title: เทยไทบ้านเดอะซีรีส์
